Address.label: Address
Address.value: 500 COLONIAL CENTER PARKWAY,SUITE 140, ROSWELL, Georgia, 30076, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Vestis Corporation provides customized uniform rental and purchase programs in the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico, and Japan. The company's products include uniforms, floor mats, towel service, restroom supplies, equipment, mops, first aid, flame resistant, cleanroom, and healthcare. It serves food service, food processing, automotive, manufacturing, healthcare, and cleanroom industries. Vestis Corporation was founded in 1936 and is based in Roswell, Georgia.

value.name: Grant Shih
